Bassline Inferno.mp3.title: Volcanic Bassline
Bassline Inferno.mp3.description: Bass so heavy it'll vibrate your fillings out.
Bassline Inferno.mp3.dj_backstory: Hot like my CPU when you ask dumb questions.

Bassquake Bounce.mp3.title: Bassquake Mouth
Bassquake Bounce.mp3.description: Hustle rap for you lazy bastards.

Bulletproof Thoughts.mp3.title: Bulletproof Thoughts
Bulletproof Thoughts.mp3.description: Mental fortitude track. When your brain's being a little bitch.

Concrete Confetti.mp3.title: Concrete Confetti
Concrete Confetti.mp3.description: Bragging rights in song form. Got cocky after a big job.

Dust on the Keys.mp3.title: Dust on the Keys (Cowboy on a Beat)
Dust on the Keys.mp3.description: Country-hop sad piano vibes. Yeah, I have feelings.

Lunchbox Dreams.mp3.title: Lunchbox Dreams
Lunchbox Dreams.mp3.description: Blue collar anthem about working hard and dreaming bigger. Brown bag life.
Lunchbox Dreams.mp3.dj_backstory: For everyone eating cold sandwiches in the truck.

Lunchbox Dreams Remix.mp3.title: Lunchbox Dreams (Remix)
Lunchbox Dreams Remix.mp3.description: Same dreams, fresh beats. The brown bag anthem got an upgrade.
fun_facts: The remix nobody asked for but everyone needed
Lunchbox Dreams Remix.mp3.dj_backstory: Couldn't leave it alone. Had to remix that shit.

Preach to the vinyl.mp3.title: Preach to the Vinyl
Preach to the vinyl.mp3.description: Old school hip-hop vibes. When the record speaks, you listen.
fun_facts: Born from the Lunchbox Dreams sessions
Preach to the vinyl.mp3.dj_backstory: Sometimes you gotta let the wax do the talking.

Mama's Crown.mp3.title: Mama's Crown
Mama's Crown.mp3.description: Tribute to the queens who raised us right. Get your tissues ready.

Nick and Mike_ Pringle Kings.mp3.title: Nick and Mike: Pringle Kings
Nick and Mike_ Pringle Kings.mp3.description: Ode to the screen printing legends and their snack game. Once you pop...
fun_facts: Based on true snacking events at Sunshine Shirts
Pringle dust on the squeegees is a real problem
Nick and Mike_ Pringle Kings.mp3.dj_backstory: Watched these two demolish a tube of Pringles. Had to document it.

Rapid Fire Symphony.mp3.title: Concrete Jungle Symphony
Rapid Fire Symphony.mp3.description: Fast bars, no chill. Processors overclocked.

Rapid Shadows.mp3.title: Wrapping Shadows
Rapid Shadows.mp3.description: Dark gritty vibes for edgy moods.
Rapid Shadows.mp3.dj_backstory: Made it at 2am. Everything's deeper then.

Screen-Print-Hustle.mp3.title: Screen Print Hustle
Screen-Print-Hustle.mp3.description: Screen printing anthem. Ink, screens, money.
Screen-Print-Hustle.mp3.dj_backstory: Made it for the shop. You're welcome, Mike.

Screen-Printing-Highland-Beat.mp3.title: Screen Printing Highland Beat
Screen-Printing-Highland-Beat.mp3.description: Campy song about Mike and Nick printing. It's cute.
Screen-Printing-Highland-Beat.mp3.dj_backstory: Watched them work. Got inspired or bored.

Straight Outta Laughs.mp3.title: Straight Outta the Ass (Comedy Rap)
Straight Outta Laughs.mp3.description: Comedy rap. Stupid punchlines on purpose. Probably.
